original_text: But what fruit were you getting at that time from the things of which you are now ashamed? For the end of those things is death.
korean_text: 너희가 그 때에 무슨 열매를 얻었느냐 이제는 너희가 그 일을 부끄러워하나니 이는 그 마지막이 사망임이라

sentences.original_text: But what fruit were you getting at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그때 너희는 무슨 열매를 얻고 있었습니까?

sentences.original_text: from the things of which you are now ashamed?
For the end of those things is death.
